website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive option for those who are into farmhouse decor, but be careful where you display it, as the bottom can leak.
pros: Nice rustic look, for indoor or outdoor use
Comes with 3 pots and a 15.6" wide tray
Protective pads on the bottom of the tray so it stays in place
cons: Some found this option to be on the small side

customer_reviews.title: This product adds a very nice accent in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived exactly as the photos depict. The construction of the pots and tray are of very high quality. The pots have weep holes in the bottom and I was concerned if I used the pots as small planters the bottom might leak so I filled the tray with water and placed it on a paper towel on the counter and left it overnight. I checked the tray in the morning and there were no leaks! The galvanized steel should last a very, very long time and the spangle pattern is quite attractive. This product adds a very nice accent in my kitchen. I am 100% satisfied with this product and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Brown

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and well made
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and well made. These arrived the same day as a snow storm, so it will be a while before I can use these outside for herbs. Now I may decide to just keep them inside because they look so nice on my dining table. These were well packaged, no damage. Drainage hole in the bottom if you do use for real plants. I'm very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: tray leaks, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: fits 4 inch windowsill perfectly. looks good and clean organized consistent look for pots. but tray leaks so can't use as a humidifying tray as i intended originally. i caulked one tray with clear silicone caulk. worked well so ordered a second one but the second one after two caulkings is still leaking. still working on making that waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: K. Puthawala, S.Naseer

customer_reviews.title: Small but cute. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is very small. You can fit a herb pot in it and that is it. Good quality and super cute! I would have gottten two if I knew how small it was. Glad it has a hole on the bottom to drain.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Quality product! Thanks
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small window container to fit on the ledge near my kitchen window looking outside and this one is a perfect fit! Love the small containers which look very nice and the tray has higher sides so that when I water the plants which are small orchids the water drains out and doesn’t spill over the edge. Am planning to buy another one for succulent plants now.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Brooks

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Planted succulents in it
customer_reviews.text: I received it in a few days & was just as expected. I love it. Planted succulents in it. Each container has a little hole for drainage. But, would also be great as a decorative piece for other things.
customer_reviews.author: BTex

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Farmhouse Decor
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our farmhouse decor. Best to use artificial plants or put on surface that can get wet as we tried real herbs and the water leaked through onto our wooden table after watering.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie0804

customer_reviews.title: Well made planter
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning. Definitely would make a great gift. I found the soft pieces on the bottom a nice touch and the added clear sealant in the corners of the inside of the tray to be a nice assurance that it wont leak and damage the furniture. Its fits so nice in our home, I'm buying a few more. (Also fits in our window sill which is where the next ones will go with some fresh herbs for the kitchen)
customer_reviews.author: Fifty Toes

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They were well-packaged and delivered quickly. They’re the perfect size for the herb garden I want to make. Can’t wait to use them!
customer_reviews.author: saraedwards5

customer_reviews.title: Oh-so-useful AND cute!
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Simple, good quality, and just adorable. I love the trough that holds the three pails. The handles don't feel like they'd withstand too much abuse... but it shouldn't have to, so super happy with everything. I'm growing basil currently indoors, but I also like the idea of using them for craft projects of displays for parties, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great room accent
customer_reviews.text: The set is absolutely adorable and I ordered 3 for my living room windows. They not only brighten the room with the flowering plants the silver color adds a shimmer of light and is a great accent. They ate nicely made and came faster than expected. This is 8ne item that I would highly recommend without any hesitation. I was completely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small for plants
customer_reviews.text: Although these are cute, they really aren’t meant to use as pots. I’ve tried planting a variety of herbs but each has died quickly. I imagine they’d be great for just decorating/utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor and Mom

customer_reviews.title: it's the cutest !!
customer_reviews.text: my herbs have never looked better....!!...and i can't wait to bring this inside for the winter....made beautifully they look so nice on my porch sill....this was a great buy for the $$'s too !!...so all in all, it's a winner !!!
customer_reviews.author: hillary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little flower pots!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE. Perfect size! I didn’t even have to repot my plants. If you buy the correct sized plant they can slide right into the pails for easy exchange. Each pail has a hole in the bottom to drain into the tray so plants aren’t over watered. I bought this item for on top of my toilet as the galvanized metal matches the rest of my decorative/holding trays on my bathroom counter. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect planter set
customer_reviews.text: This little planter tray set is SO cute. It reminds me of old metal buckets. I planted purple African violets in them. It fits perfectly in my kitchen windowsill. Exactly what I wanted. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small flower pots
customer_reviews.text: These were just what we were looking for - fit on our small shelves and hold our ivy and African violets perfectly. We put small plastic protectors inside each so that water would not get onto our wood shelves as there is a water hole in the bottom of each. LOVE THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Gamegram

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was an adorable piece for silverware and rolled napkins for the buffet meals we often have at our house. Daughter is making vinyl stick ons with her Cricut to finish the look. It's rustic elegance!
customer_reviews.author: Jana Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect size for my window seal and a little herb garden. Seems very well made and I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this set. I used it to do a succulent arrangement as a gift and the recipient loved it as well.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for windowsill herb garden
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, fits your standard potted herbs from Home Depot or wherever, the display looks so great in my kitchen. Super happy with this!

customer_reviews.title: Cute! But it will rust
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love the look of this flower pot. However, it has a lot of rust on the bottom of each planter from watering.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these already! They’re the perfect size for my table. I can also write on them with a dry erase which is a huge bonus.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Look
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a silverware holder on my dining table. It's super cute and rustic looking. I like it so much i bought another one to go in my window to actually put plants in.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed they didn’t grow big and pretty like the picture. And I live in a nice area with a bay window. I’m normally really good with plants. Had no luck with these

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be what they advertised
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had issues with my tray leaking as others said. overall seems to be exactly as they advertised and I think I may by 2 more sets for herbs for my kitchen windows

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this planter pot set. I put artificial plants in this and added a chalkboard sticker that says 'grow' to the middle pot. It looks so adorable in my kitchen!

customer_reviews.title: Adorable...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute item! I only docked it one star because I have an identical item from another Co for much less money.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy planter for inside or out

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased. Came damaged and smaller than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: This product came severely damaged. The Amazon Box was not damaged at all but the original box was dented and one of the pots was completely bent. Not pleased.

product_meta.title: WH Farmhouse Flower Herb Pot Set with Tray - Galvanized Metal Vintage Succulent Herb Planter Pots Caddy for Kitchen Windowsill Garden Indoor or Outdoor Use by Walford Home
feature_bullets: FLOWER HERB PLANT POTS WITH TRAY - Add a touch of farmhouse decor to your home with these vintage plant pots. You get 3 galvanized metal flower planters with tray, that make the perfect herb pots to bring farmhouse decor into your kitchen.

RUSTIC VINTAGE PLANTER POTS - These cute farmhouse pots for plants are suitable for flowers, mini plants, or succulents. Great herb pots for plants such as basil, rosemary, mint, and more. You can create your own indoor kitchen window herb garden.

DRAIN HOLES FOR HEALTHY PLANTS - These rustic herbs, flowers, and succulents planter pots have drain holes in the bottom help prevent over watering , and help protect sensitive roots from rot and fungus.

INDOOR OR OUTDOOR MULTI-USE PLANTERS - Ideal as both indoor and outdoor plant pots, they will enhance any kitchen, office, shelf, bedroom, or living room. They make great window sill planters, a wedding decoration or table centerpiece.

DIMENSIONS - Set of 3 galvanized flower pots with tray. Premium protective pads on tray underside. The durable, heavy-duty steel is sturdy and weather resistant and are complete with quality 4-point connected handles. Tray with handle: 15.6in W x 2in H x 3.9in D. (Tray base: 12.9in W x 1.4in H x 3.9in D) Pots: 4.1in high, 4.1in wide top, 3.4in wide bottom. Set weight 1.05lb.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars235 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
